name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: North Korea has announced that it will send a group of citizens called the “cheering squad” to next month’s Winter Olympics. And many of them are expected to actually compete in a new event called the “400 Meter Defection.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Doctors are saying the result of President Trump’s physical revealed that he is borderline obese. In fairness, he did promise us growth.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: After the results of his physical were released, many Americans are claiming President Trump is lying about his weight. In other words, maybe he really is one of us.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Professional race car driver Danica Patrick is dating again, after breaking up with her previous boyfriend, a NASCAR driver. When asked why that relationship didn’t work out, Patrick explained, “We were just going in circles.”

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Trump is now claiming his approval rating among black Americans has doubled. In other words, Ben Carson voted twice.
